comments.body: Do you mind implementing this in Java as a public class with a public constructor that accepts a string?
comments.diffHunk:

+package org.apache.spark
+
+/**
+ * This class represents unique application id for identifying each application
+ */
+private[spark] case class ApplicationId(appId: String) {
